PAGE_SLIDES.title: Welcome to Maint24/7
PAGE_SLIDES.text: Maint24/7 is a practical, modern and simple tool for landlords and tenants to manage properties, maintenance, contracts and payments.

PAGE_SLIDES.title: Manage your properties
PAGE_SLIDES.text: A portal in the palm of your hands that gives you live updates to keep you in the loop of everything that is happening at your property.

PAGE_SLIDES.title: Maintenance
PAGE_SLIDES.text: Tenants are able to create work orders, photograph ongoing issues and get updates. All work orders are also stored on the history.

PAGE_SLIDES.title: Payment
PAGE_SLIDES.text: Tenants can pay rent online or by using their mobile device. PayPal alows payments to be made instantly or gives the option of reoccuring payments.
